home_page_s1: Discover this evaluation method that simplifies your work and enhances your students' understanding.
home_page_s2: Evaluation rubrics set task expectations in a matrix model, making student evaluation highly efficient in terms of automation and productivity...
home_page_s3: RubricPro is a system that enables the creation and management of evaluation rubrics. Using our app, you’ll find it much easier to create your customized evaluation rubrics and apply them directly within the system.
home_page_first_rubric: Click here to create your first evaluation rubric
rubric_manager_no_rubric: It seems you haven’t created any evaluation rubrics yet!
rubric_manager_no_rubric_pt2: Below, you’ll find some templates from our system, or you can create your rubric from scratch!
modal_delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete this rubric? This action cannot be undone.
modal_row_delete_message: Are you sure you want to remove this row? This action cannot be undone.
modal_column_delete_message: Are you sure you want to remove this column? This action cannot be undone.
modal_clean_message: Are you sure you want to clear the Rubric? This action cannot be undone. All matrix data will be lost and the rubric will return to 3 rows by 5 columns.
modal_evaluation_delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete this evaluation? This action cannot be undone.
no majors and courses found: It seems you don't have any majors and courses linked to you yet!
tour_step_1: Welcome to RubricPro, a system for creating and managing evaluation rubrics. Shall we start the tour?
tour_step_2: Click here to view your rubric manager.
